feedback.discard_changes_description: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?

goals.heading: Goals
goals.title: Define your goals
goals.description: Choose the goal that is most important to you.

goals_motivation.title: Goals
goals_motivation.subtitle: Your transformation starts here!
goals_motivation.description_1: You're embarking on an incredible journey, and every step counts.
goals_motivation.description_2: Yes, there will be challenges, but you're not doing this aloneâ€”we've got your back with the tools you need to help you crush your goals!
goals_motivation.footer: P.S. You've already done the hardest part: getting started.

obstacles.title: Obstacles
obstacles.description: What were your obstacles in the past?
obstacles.description_2: You can select as many options as you want.

obstacles_motivation.title: Let's do this!
obstacles_motivation.subtitle: You're not alone this time.
obstacles_motivation.description_1: Following a strict diet isn't always realistic, and that's okay.
obstacles_motivation.description_2: We've helped many others overcome obstacles just like these, and we're here to help you do the same.
obstacles_motivation.description_3: Next, tell us what you've tried in the past.

past_attempts.heading: Past Attempts
past_attempts.title: What have you tried?
past_attempts.subtitle: Select all the methods you've tried in the past to lose weight.

activity_level.heading: Activity Level
activity_level.title: What's your activity level?
activity_level.subtitle: Choose the option that best describes your typical week.

about_you.heading: About You
about_you.title: Tell us about yourself
about_you.subtitle: This will help us personalize your plan.

weekly_loss_goal.title: Weekly Goal
weekly_loss_goal.subtitle: How much weight do you want to lose?

loading.title: Hold tight!
loading.subtitle: We're calculating your personalized intake plan...
loading.description: This can take a few seconds.

final.title: Congrats!
final.subtitle: You've completed the onboarding process and your personalized plan is ready!
final.feature_1: Lose weight at a healthy pace
final.feature_2: Track your weight on a daily basis
final.sources: These results are based on the following sources:

scan.title: Scan your food
scan.subtitle: Scan or describe the food you eat to automatically log your calories.

analyze.title: Analyze your food
analyze.subtitle: Let AI do the heavy lifting for you. No more weighing your food.

track.title: Track your progress
track.subtitle: Add food to your progress to see how you're tracking toward your goals.

paywall.title: Change your life today
paywall.subtitle: Unlock the unlimited version, effortless calorie tracking and faster results, powered by AI.

settings.sources_description: The information provided by this app is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read in this app. You can find more information in the following sources:
